post.body: I thought I'd ask here since I may get a straighter answer, since this may be an anti-Doom3/anti-id thing. Someone went into my ModDB profile and changed all the "categories" to "comedy", heheh. Yeah, real funny. I remember setting them as "sci-fi" and no one else should have access. There were also a couple of files deleted apparently. Nothing has happened since I changed my password but it's a worry, since this might mean they also get my password, which I do reuse on some other "low-security" sites. Such a thing could be disasterous for someone else. For me it was just a prank, it seems, but I thought I'd bring it up just incase.
